news.title: Task Manager Performance Update
news.author: Sw7ft
news.content:
We've significantly improved the Task Manager performance! The new version includes:

- **Faster boot times** - 80-90% improvement in startup speed
- **Optimized process scanning** - Better pidin usage for QNX devices
- **Caching system** - 5-minute cache for network requests
- **Modal app details** - Click apps to see descriptions before installing
- **App name display** - Cleaner process list showing app names instead of full commands

These improvements make the Task Manager much more responsive on BlackBerry Passport devices.

news.title: New App: Advanced File Manager
news.author: Sw7ft
news.content:
A powerful file manager is now available in the CLI utilities section!

**Features:**
- Browse and manage files with ease
- Copy, move, and delete operations
- Search functionality
- File permissions management
- Archive creation and extraction

Perfect for managing your BB10 device files efficiently.

news.title: Android APK Collection Updated
news.author: Sw7ft
news.content:
We've added several new Android APKs to our collection:

- **Termux** - Advanced terminal emulator
- **F-Droid** - Open source app store
- **K-9 Mail** - Email client
- **Signal** - Secure messaging
- **VLC** - Media player

All APKs are tested and compatible with BB10 Android runtime.

news.title: Auto-Start Configuration Guide
news.author: Sw7ft
news.content:
Learn how to configure apps to start automatically when your device boots!

**How to use Auto-Start:**
1. Go to the Auto-Start Apps section
2. Find the app you want to auto-start
3. Click 'Enable Auto Start'
4. The app will now start automatically on boot

This is perfect for essential apps like your web server or monitoring tools.
